sqlMap.statement: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DMN_RTL_SWH SWH WHERE SWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SWH.DWH_TRGT_DT = #trgtDt# AND SWH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT RSWH.INVTY_LOC_CD ,RSWH.RTL_WH_CD ,RSWH.RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.RTL_WH_NM ,RSWH.RTL_SWH_NM ,RWH.LOC_TP_CD ,RWH.TECH_TOC_CD ,RWH.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,RWH.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,RWH.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.CTY_ADDR ,RWH.CNTY_PK ,RWH.PROV_NM ,RWH.ST_CD ,RWH.POST_CD ,RWH.CTRY_CD ,RWH.ADDL_LOC_NM ,RWH.FAX_NUM ,RWH.TEL_NUM ,RWH.ATTN_NM ,RWH.EFF_FROM_DT AS RTL_WH_EFF_FROM_DT ,RWH.EFF_THRU_DT AS RTL_WH_EFF_THRU_DT ,RWH.COA_BR_CD ,CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,CB.COA_BR_RG_CD ,CBR.COA_BR_RG_DESC_TXT ,CB.COA_BR_ZN_CD ,CBZ.COA_BR_ZN_DESC_TXT ,NVL(RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_NUM_01, #dfltRtlWhRptOpId#) AS RTL_WH_RPT_OP_ID ,NVL(RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01, #dfltRtlWhRptRgTxt#) AS RTL_WH_RPT_RG_TXT ,RSWH.RTL_SWH_DSBL_FLG ,RSWH.EFF_FROM_DT AS RTL_SWH_EFF_FROM_DT ,RSWH.EFF_THRU_DT AS RTL_SWH_EFF_THRU_DT ,RWH.RTL_WH_CATG_CD ,WC.RTL_WH_CATG_DESC_TXT ,RWH.PHYS_WH_CD ,RWH.WMS_WH_CD ,WW.WMS_DESC_NM ,RWH.WH_MGR_PSN_CD ,PSN.FULL_PSN_NM AS WH_MGR_PSN_FULL_NM ,RWH.ALT_PSN_CD ,PSN2.FULL_PSN_NM AS ALT_PSN_FULL_NM ,RWH.INVTY_ACCT_CD ,IA.INVTY_ACCT_DESC_TXT ,RWH.INVTY_OWNR_CD ,IO.INVTY_OWNR_DESC_TXT ,IO.CMPY_INVTY_FLG ,RWH.WH_OWNR_CD ,WO.WH_OWNR_DESC_TXT ,RWH.FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT ,RWH.SCD_REF_CMNT_TXT ,RWH.AUTO_SO_DROP_FLG ,RWH.SO_PRIN_REQ_FLG ,RWH.RWS_PRIN_REQ_FLG ,RWH.WH_SYS_TP_CD ,WS.WH_SYS_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.WH_START_TM ,RWH.WH_END_TM ,RWH.WH_CUT_OFF_TM ,RWH.TM_ZONE_CD ,RWH.GEO_CD ,RWH.SRC_ZN_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.DEF_SRC_LOC_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT2.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS EMER_SRC_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.EMER_SRC_LOC_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT3.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS DEF_RTRN_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_LOC_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.PRF_CARR_CD ,RWH.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD ,PI.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_DESC_TXT ,RWH.GND_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.FIRST_OVNGT_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.SCD_OVNGT_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CUST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_LOC_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CTY_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CNTY_PK ,RWH.RTRN_TO_PROV_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_POST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CTRY_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FAX_NUM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_TEL_NUM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ATTN_NM ,RWH.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD ,PRT.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD ,RRT.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_DESC_TXT FROM RTL_WH RWH ,RTL_SWH RSWH ,COA_BR CB ,COA_BR_RG CBR ,COA_BR_ZN CBZ ,RPT_COND_CONST RCC ,RPT_COND_CONST RCC2 ,RTL_WH_CATG WC ,WMS_WH WW ,S21_PSN_V PSN ,S21_PSN_V PSN2 ,INVTY_ACCT IA ,INVTY_OWNR IO ,WH_OWNR WO ,WH_SYS_TP WS ,PROCR_TP PT ,PROCR_TP PT2 ,PROCR_TP PT3 ,PLN_ITEM_INSRC PI ,PO_RCPT_RTE_TP PRT ,RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP RRT WHERE RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RSWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RWH.RTL_WH_CD = RSWH.RTL_WH_CD AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.COA_BR_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.RTL_WH_CD = RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_CD(+) AND RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_GRP_ID(+) = #rtlWhRptRg# AND CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CBR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CB.COA_BR_RG_CD = CBR.COA_BR_RG_CD(+) AND CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CBZ.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CB.COA_BR_ZN_CD = CBZ.COA_BR_ZN_CD(+) AND RCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCC2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 = RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_CD(+) AND RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_GRP_ID(+) = #rtlWhRptOpId# AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.RTL_WH_CATG_CD = WC.RTL_WH_CATG_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WW.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WMS_WH_CD = WW.WH_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_MGR_PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND RWH.ALT_PSN_CD = PSN2.PSN_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.INVTY_ACCT_CD = IA.INVTY_ACCT_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.INVTY_OWNR_CD = IO.INVTY_OWNR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_OWNR_CD = WO.WH_OWNR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_SYS_TP_CD = WS.WH_SYS_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD = PT.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.EMER_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD = PT2.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT3.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_PROCR_TP_CD = PT3.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD = PI.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD = PRT.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD = RRT.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RSWH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CBR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CBZ.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RCC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RCC2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PSN2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND IA.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND IO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT3.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RRT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
UNION ALL
SELECT WH.WH_CD AS INVTY_LOC_CD ,RWH.RTL_WH_CD ,'' AS RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.RTL_WH_NM ,'' AS RTL_SWH_NM ,RWH.LOC_TP_CD ,RWH.TECH_TOC_CD ,RWH.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,RWH.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,RWH.FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.CTY_ADDR ,RWH.CNTY_PK ,RWH.PROV_NM ,RWH.ST_CD ,RWH.POST_CD ,RWH.CTRY_CD ,RWH.ADDL_LOC_NM ,RWH.FAX_NUM ,RWH.TEL_NUM ,RWH.ATTN_NM ,RWH.EFF_FROM_DT AS RTL_WH_EFF_FROM_DT ,RWH.EFF_THRU_DT AS RTL_WH_EFF_THRU_DT ,RWH.COA_BR_CD ,CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,CB.COA_BR_RG_CD ,CBR.COA_BR_RG_DESC_TXT ,CB.COA_BR_ZN_CD ,CBZ.COA_BR_ZN_DESC_TXT ,NVL(RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_NUM_01, #dfltRtlWhRptOpId#) AS RTL_WH_RPT_OP_ID ,NVL(RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01, #dfltRtlWhRptRgTxt#) AS RTL_WH_RPT_RG_TXT ,'N' AS RTL_SWH_DSBL_FLG ,RWH.EFF_FROM_DT AS RTL_SWH_EFF_FROM_DT ,RWH.EFF_THRU_DT AS RTL_SWH_EFF_THRU_DT ,RWH.RTL_WH_CATG_CD ,WC.RTL_WH_CATG_DESC_TXT ,RWH.PHYS_WH_CD ,RWH.WMS_WH_CD ,WW.WMS_DESC_NM ,RWH.WH_MGR_PSN_CD ,PSN.FULL_PSN_NM AS WH_MGR_PSN_FULL_NM ,RWH.ALT_PSN_CD ,PSN2.FULL_PSN_NM AS ALT_PSN_FULL_NM ,RWH.INVTY_ACCT_CD ,IA.INVTY_ACCT_DESC_TXT ,RWH.INVTY_OWNR_CD ,IO.INVTY_OWNR_DESC_TXT ,IO.CMPY_INVTY_FLG ,RWH.WH_OWNR_CD ,WO.WH_OWNR_DESC_TXT ,RWH.FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT ,RWH.SCD_REF_CMNT_TXT ,RWH.AUTO_SO_DROP_FLG ,RWH.SO_PRIN_REQ_FLG ,RWH.RWS_PRIN_REQ_FLG ,RWH.WH_SYS_TP_CD ,WS.WH_SYS_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.WH_START_TM ,RWH.WH_END_TM ,RWH.WH_CUT_OFF_TM ,RWH.TM_ZONE_CD ,RWH.GEO_CD ,RWH.SRC_ZN_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.DEF_SRC_LOC_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.DEF_SRC_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT2.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS DEF_RTRN_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.EMER_SRC_LOC_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.EMER_SRC_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_PROCR_TP_CD ,PT3.PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT AS DEF_RTRN_PROCR_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_LOC_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_RTL_WH_CD ,RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_RTL_SWH_CD ,RWH.PRF_CARR_CD ,RWH.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD ,PI.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_DESC_TXT ,RWH.GND_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.FIRST_OVNGT_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.SCD_OVNGT_SVC_LVL_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CUST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_LOC_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CTY_ADDR ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CNTY_PK ,RWH.RTRN_TO_PROV_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_POST_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_CTRY_CD ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_FAX_NUM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_TEL_NUM ,RWH.RTRN_TO_ATTN_NM ,RWH.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD ,PRT.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_DESC_TXT ,RWH.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD ,RRT.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_DESC_TXT FROM WH WH ,RTL_WH RWH ,COA_BR CB ,COA_BR_RG CBR ,COA_BR_ZN CBZ ,RPT_COND_CONST RCC ,RPT_COND_CONST RCC2 ,RTL_WH_CATG WC ,WMS_WH WW ,S21_PSN_V PSN ,S21_PSN_V PSN2 ,INVTY_ACCT IA ,INVTY_OWNR IO ,WH_OWNR WO ,WH_SYS_TP WS ,PROCR_TP PT ,PROCR_TP PT2 ,PROCR_TP PT3 ,PLN_ITEM_INSRC PI ,PO_RCPT_RTE_TP PRT ,RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP RRT WHERE WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RTL_SWH RS WHERE WH.WH_CD = RS.INVTY_LOC_CD) AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND WH.WH_CD = RWH.RTL_WH_CD AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.COA_BR_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.RTL_WH_CD = RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_CD(+) AND RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_GRP_ID(+) = #rtlWhRptRg# AND CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CBR.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CB.COA_BR_RG_CD = CBR.COA_BR_RG_CD(+) AND CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CBZ.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CB.COA_BR_ZN_CD = CBZ.COA_BR_ZN_CD(+) AND RCC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RCC2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RCC.RPT_COND_CONST_VAL_TXT_01 = RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_CD(+) AND RCC2.RPT_COND_CONST_GRP_ID(+) = #rtlWhRptOpId# AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.RTL_WH_CATG_CD = WC.RTL_WH_CATG_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WW.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WMS_WH_CD = WW.WH_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_MGR_PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.ALT_PSN_CD = PSN2.PSN_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IA.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.INVTY_ACCT_CD = IA.INVTY_ACCT_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = IO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.INVTY_OWNR_CD = IO.INVTY_OWNR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WO.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_OWNR_CD = WO.WH_OWNR_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = WS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.WH_SYS_TP_CD = WS.WH_SYS_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.DEF_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD = PT.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT2.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.EMER_SRC_PROCR_TP_CD = PT2.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PT3.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.DEF_RTRN_TO_PROCR_TP_CD = PT3.PROCR_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD = PI.PLN_ITEM_INSRC_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD = PRT.PO_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD(+) AND RWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RRT.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RWH.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD = RRT.RMA_RCPT_RTE_TP_CD(+) AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RWH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CBR.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND CBZ.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RCC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RCC2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PSN2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND IA.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND IO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WO.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND WS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT2.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PT3.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PRT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RRT.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY INVTY_LOC_CD ,LOC_TP_CD
